function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Early stage outbreak containment in a specific area","Impact":"Limiting the spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Implementing travel restrictions and intensive control measures","Technologies":"Controlled access technologies, geofencing, and surveillance systems","People":"Population in the affected area","Owner":"Government authorities and health organizations"},{"Description":"Decreased effectiveness of travel restrictions in widespread outbreak","Impact":"Less effective containment of the disease","Mitigation":"Implementing additional containment measures and protocols, such as testing, contact tracing, and quarantine","Technologies":"Advanced testing technologies, contact tracing apps, and quarantine monitoring systems","People":"Population in the affected and surrounding areas","Owner":"Government authorities, health organizations, and community leaders"},{"Description":"Balancing public health benefits with negative impacts on freedom of movement, economy, and society","Impact":"Trade-offs between public health and socio-economic factors","Mitigation":"Conducting extensive risk-benefit analysis and implementing targeted support for affected individuals and businesses","Technologies":"Economic impact assessment tools, social support systems, and public health impact evaluation software","People":"General population, businesses, and policymakers","Owner":"Government authorities, social support organizations, and policy experts"}]}
